"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a86f776368722bf9f70300#post_54a86f776368722bf9f70300
I can't wait for a decade from now cause I think everyone's getting tired of youtube's copyright shit.

What I mean by this is that fifteen years ago stuff like myspace and such was "oh my god!  This is amazing!  I wonder how any server can handle this much content?"  In a decade or so my money is on there being a million youtube clone sites cause storing that many videos will become not a big deal.
